    • Method Detail

      • addAction

        public void addAction(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode k)
        Adds the action based on the KeyCode input if the action based on the control keys is not null, the continuous action attribute gets set to the action if it is null otherwise the actions are added to the queue to get processed later.
        Parameters:
        k - is the KeyCode

      • cancelAction

        public void cancelAction(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode k)
        Cancels the action only if it is a continuous action e.g. walking/cover
        Parameters:
        k - is the KeyCode

      • act

        void act(long now)
        Specified by:
        act in class Actor

      • advanceFrame

        public void advanceFrame(ComboSet currSet,
                         long now,
                         boolean isSingleAction)
        Determines the next act step for the player
        Parameters:
        currSet - is the current comboSet the player is acting out
        now - is the current time
        isSingleAction - is if the current action being processed is a single action or a combo

      • isFacingRight

        public boolean isFacingRight()
        Returns:
        depending on which way the players are facing it will return true or false

      • getHealth

        public int getHealth()

      • changeX

        public void changeX(double d)
        Makes constraints for the player as to where it can move prevents the player from going outside the map
        Parameters:
        d - is the current X position of the player plus the distance to move

      • resetAllPosExcept

        public void resetAllPosExcept(java.lang.String name)
        Resets all of the positions in the hash map of ComboSets to 0 except the specified or null if all of them should be reset
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the specified ComboSet to not be reset null should be input if all of them are to be reset
